Key Match Events: How India's bowlers fare against England's openers in the Powerplay could be crucial
Pre-Game Insights: India are favorites heading into the match; England have regained their mojo after a tough group stage
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian spin trio will need to perform well against England's aggressive batting lineup; head-to-head statistics show India have a better record in T20 World Cups
Others: Probable XI for India: Rohit Sharma, Virat Kohli, Rishabh Pant, Suryakumar Yadav, Hardik Pandya, Shivam Dube, Ravindra Jadeja, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Jasprit Bumrah, Arshdeep Singh
